channel.title: How to make an updater?
channel.description: Well, everytime i add stuff do my server client, i have to release it and everyone has to download the new client to get the updated stuff, is there a way to just make it update automatically when they start the client?

item.title: How to make an updater?
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

Well, everytime i add stuff do my server client, i have to release it and everyone has to download the new client to get the updated stuff, is there a way to just make it update automatically when they start the client?

Read full topic
